WorkflowInfo.Name: Compare two configuration files
WorkflowInfo.Xoml:
<SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:CreateMemoryTable;Assembly=CreateMemoryTable, Version=1.2.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:SendEmail;Assembly=SendEmail, Version=1.2.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:ExitWhile;Assembly=ExitWhile, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:GetCellValue;Assembly=GetCellValue, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:FileCheckSumComparison;Assembly=FileCheckSumComparison, Version=1.4.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns6="clr-namespace:ReturnValue;Assembly=ReturnValue, Version=1.2.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns7="clr-namespace:SetCellValue;Assembly=SetCellValue, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns8="clr-namespace:ReadFile;Assembly=ReadFile, Version=1.4.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns9="clr-namespace:MemoryTableComparison;Assembly=MemoryTableComparison, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns10="clr-namespace:ConvertToPlainText;Assembly=ConvertToPlainText, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns11="clr-namespace:GetDate;Assembly=GetDate, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns12="clr-namespace:WriteFile;Assembly=WriteFile, Version=1.2.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"> <ns0:CreateMemoryTable IsValid="True" x:Name="createMemoryTable1" ColumnNumber="2" TableName="Servers" RowNumber="5" isEmptyGrid="0" Description="Creates a memory table." DisplayName="Create Memory Table" TypeName="CreateMemoryTable" TableAsString="<NewDataSet>
 <xs:schema id="NewDataSet" xmlns="" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:msdata="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xml-msdata">
 <xs:element name="NewDataSet" msdata:IsDataSet="true" msdata:MainDataTable="resultSet" msdata:UseCurrentLocale="true">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:choice minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">
 <xs:element name="resultSet">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:sequence>
 <xs:element name="Server_x0020_Name" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="Are_x0020_Files_x0020_Equal" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 </xs:sequence>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:choice>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:schema>
 <resultSet>

 <Are_x0020_Files_x0020_Equal />
 </resultSet>

 <Are_x0020_Files_x0020_Equal />
 </resultSet>

 </resultSet>

 <Are_x0020_Files_x0020_Equal />
 </resultSet>
</NewDataSet>" /> <ns1:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount1" ResultSet="%Servers%" ResultSetName="Servers" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." DisplayName="Get Rows Count" TypeName="GetRowsCount" /> <WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity1" Condition="{x:Null}"> <SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity1"> <ns3:ExitWhile DisplayName="Exit While" x:Name="exitWhile1" Description="Exit current while activity" IsValid="True" TypeName="ExitWhile" Counter="%getRowsCount1%" /> <ns4:GetCellValue IsValid="True" x:Name="ServerName" ColumnNumber="1" ResultSet="%Servers%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="Servers" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> <ns5:FileCheckSumComparison DstHostName="%ServerName%" DstPassword="" x:Name="fileCheckSumComparison1" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:02:00" SrcUserName="" SrcHostName="Localhost" DstPath="c:\RemoteFile.config" SrcPath="c:\OriginalFile.config" Description="Compares the check sum of two files and returns whether or not they are equal" DisplayName="File CheckSum Comparison" SrcPassword="" DstUserName="" TypeName="FileCheckSumComparison" /> <IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity1"> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity1"> <ns6:ReturnValue Value="True" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue1" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,True)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns7:SetCellValue IsValid="True" ColNumber="2" NewValue="Equal" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" VariableName="%servers%" x:Name="setEqual" Description="Set a new value to a result set." DisplayName="Set Cell Value" TypeName="SetCellValue" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity2"> <ns6:ReturnValue Value="False" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue2" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,False)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns7:SetCellValue IsValid="True" ColNumber="2" NewValue="Not Equal" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" VariableName="%servers%" x:Name="setNotEqual" Description="Set a new value to a result set." DisplayName="Set Cell Value" TypeName="SetCellValue" /> <ns8:ReadFile IsValid="True" x:Name="readFile1" HostName="LocalHost" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" ReadingDirection="Top" DisplayName="Read File" Path="c:\OriginalFile.config" LinesToRead="" Password="" LineFilter="" Description="Read the file in the specified path." HostId="1" TypeName="ReadFile" UserName="" /> <ns8:ReadFile IsValid="True" x:Name="readFile2" HostName="%ServerName%" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" ReadingDirection="Top" DisplayName="Read File" Path="c:\RemoteFile.config" LinesToRead="" Password="" LineFilter="" Description="Read the file in the specified path." HostId="-2" TypeName="ReadFile" UserName="" /> <ns9:MemoryTableComparison IsValid="True" x:Name="memoryTableComparison1" ResultSetTarget="%readFile1%" isUseColumnKey="0" DisplayName="Memory Table Comparison" ShowEqual="0" Description="Performs a comparison between two ResultSets." TypeName="MemoryTableComparison" ResultSetSource="%readFile2%" ColumnKey="" /> <ns10:ConvertToPlainText DisplayName="Convert to Plain Text" x:Name="convertToPlainText1" TypeName="ConvertToPlainText" Description="Convert a ResultSet to plain text." IsValid="True" Value="%memoryTableComparison1%" /> <ns11:GetDate IsValid="True" x:Name="getDate1" TimeInterval="Minutes" FuturePast="0" DateFormat="MM_dd_yyyy_HH_mm" TimeZoneName="(UTC+02:00) Jerusalem" TimeZone="120" Description="Returns the date in the specified format." DisplayName="Get Date" TypeName="GetDate" TimeToAdd="0" /> <ns12:WriteFile IsValid="True" x:Name="writeFile1" HostName="LocalHost" TimeInSeconds="0" NewValue="%ServerName%

%memoryTableComparison1%
-----------------------------------------------------------" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Write File" Path="c:\ConfigCompareReport_%getDate1%.doc" IsAppend="True" Password="" Description="Write text to a file" HostId="1" TypeName="WriteFile" UserName="" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> </IfElseActivity> </SequenceActivity> </WhileActivity> <ns2:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="Configuration file report" DestinationNumber="1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" x:Name="sendEmail1" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="c:\ConfigCompareReport.doc" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=utf-8" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 9.00.8112.16434"></HEAD>
<BODY style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: white">
<P><FONT face=Arial><STRONG>Summary report:</STRONG><BR><BR>%Servers%<BR><BR>If 
any differences were found, attached is a detailed 
report.</FONT></P></BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /> </SequentialWorkflowActivity>
